thread.title: Knicks fans react on Twitter to Charles Oakley altercation
thread.title_full: Knicks fans react on Twitter to Charles Oakley altercation

author: JOHN HEALY
title: Knicks fans react on Twitter to Charles Oakley altercation
text:
Knicks fans react on Twitter to Charles Oakley altercation at Madison Square Garden Knicks fans react on Twitter to Charles Oakley altercation Charles Oakley confronts Knicks security. (Frank Franklin II/AP)  11 PM 
Charles Oakley caused a stir Wednesday night when an altercation with Knicks security at the Garden led to his arrest and ejection from their game against the Clippers. 
The former Knicks forward, who played 10 seasons with the franchise, is a fan favorite who was part of the 1993-94 NBA Finals team. 
As footage of his altercation and subsequent arrest made its round on Twitter, fans voiced their support for Oakley. Lot of you under 20 years old Knicks fans thought we was lying about Charles Oakley and those 90's teams..now u know pic.twitter.com/OFCmQeP5eO â€” Incarcerated Bob ðŸ”Œ (@incarceratedbob) February 9, 2017 Phil just got back to his seat from trying to calm down Oak & he look like he just wrestled the bear from TheRevenant pic.twitter.com/U151mXHFUY â€” Rob Perez (@World_Wide_Wob) February 9, 2017 OAKLEY IS STILL ABOUT THAT LIFE pic.twitter.com/hZEbXGnZJv â€” Olamilekan Ogedenla (@Nigerianscamsss) February 9, 2017 What Charles Oakley wanted to do to James Dolan tonight pic.twitter.com/NEGid5yKVS â€” Shooter McGavin (@ShooterMcGavin_) February 9, 2017 My Dreams Have Come True:Charles Oakley is at the Garden & getting into fights with Security KNICKS ARE BACK BABY pic.twitter.com/qYSnnYPlr3
